A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I did't like the movie in general\, I didn't like the plot and not because it was meant to be for young kids. Just take a look at \"Ponyo\"\, just to mention one. I didn't like because when anything is possible (see all those new force power\, escape maneuvers\, and suspense of disbelief)\, then nothing makes sense anymore. And I don't care if actors' performances were good and special effects perfect\, there was never a sense of reality\, I never felt the struggle of characters. And supermen Leia... C'mon\, really!?!?
